Package org.ensembl.util

Utility classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ArrayIterator  
AscendingInternalIDComparator  
ConnectionPoolDataSource Connection pooling implementation of a datasource.
ConnectionWrapper The ConnectionWrapper is a Proxy for an underlying connection and offers additional behaviour relevant for use in a ConnectionPool.
Counter Simple counter class.
EnsemblDBLister Convenience class that prints the databases available on ensembldb.ensembl.org to stdout.
FormattedSequencePrintStream Extended PrintStream to allow users to print fasta formatted sequence output with an unformatted header, and sequence formatted to a user-specified column width maximum, using a user supplied line ending.
FrequencyCounter Convenience class that can be used to count the number of times a key is added.
IDList List of persistent internal ids.
IDMap A fast hash map providing internalID -> Persistent object mapping.
IDSet Convenience class for managing sets of ids taken from Persistent item's internal ids.
JDBCUtil Utility functions for working with JDBC.
ListElement  
LocatableList Container for locatables that offers a convenient means of retrieving an array of the locatable's internalIDs where the locatables are sorted by genomic location.
LogFormatter Custom class for formatting log messages.
LoggingUtil Convenience functions for interacting with the logging system.
LongList Dynamic list of longs.
LongSet Set for storing unique longs.
LruCache  
Mailer Simple class to allow SMTP email to be sent.
MessageOnlyFormatter Custom class for formatting log messages, just prints the log message.
NamedTimer A class that can support multiple named timers.
Pair A simple "record" data structure representing a pair of strings.
PersistentSet Manages a set of persistent objects.
PersistentUtil  
ProgressPrinter Simple class to print & update a console percentage progress meter.
PropertiesUtil Convenience class offering methods for easily accessing property files stored as files available via file system or URL.
SequenceUtil Utility functions for dealing with sequence data.
SerialUtil  
SimpleDBAccess  
StringUtil String Utility methods.
SystemUtil  
SystemUtil.MemoryStatus  
Timer Event timer.
Util General utilities that don't fit elsewhere.
Warnings Utility class for issuing warnings.
 

Exception Summary
MethodNotSupportedException This exception is thrown as a warning from a method which has not been implemented for normal use and for which there are no plans to implement it in future.
NotImplementedYetException This exception is thrown as a warning from a part of the code which has not been implemented yet, but will be in future.
 

Package org.ensembl.util Description

Utility classes.
